response.overview: The mysterious Janel runs a second-hand clothes shop. Here she lives out her passion to give new life to clothes that deserve another chance. When three hipsters visit her shop and tell them how they want to buy clothes to cut up for their own purposes, it upsets her and she tries to convince them to change their minds. Ruth, the group's catty leader, reacts contemptuously and laughs at her. However, Ruth's venom has deadly consequences, because old Janel is not as harmless as she seems.
response.title: Thrift tot die dood
